H0.text: A Caduceus, a staff with two serpents twined around it, is associated with which profession. Pharmacist

H1.text: A Caduceus, a staff with two serpents twined around it, is associated with which profession. Diplomat

H2.text: A Caduceus, a staff with two serpents twined around it, is associated with which profession. Messenger

H3.text: A Caduceus, a staff with two serpents twined around it, is associated with which profession. Physician

A4.text: The caduceus is also a symbol of commerce and negotiation, two realms in which exchange balanced by reciprocity is recognized as an ideal.

A5.text: The caduceus is the staff carried by Hermes in Greek mythology and consequently by Hermes Trismegistus in Greco-Egyptian mythology.
